Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,!,"
" Write !,!,"

 

",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write "АКТ ТЕХНИЧЕСКОГО ОСМОТРА № "_($G(Name))_"" Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write " " Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"
    ",! Write "
  1. " Write "" Write "Наименование фирмы производителя " Write "" Write "изделия" Write "" Write ": "_($G(BrandName))_"" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write ";" Write "" Write "" Write "
    2. ",! Write "
",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write " " Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"
    ",! Write "
  1. " Write "" Write "" Write "Изделие" Write "" Write ": "_($G(GoodsName))_"" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "; " Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "Модель " Write "" Write ($G(GoodsModel)) Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "; " Write "" Write "
    2. ",! Write "
",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write " " Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"
    ",! Write "
  1. " Write "" Write "Заводской" Write "" Write !," №: "_($G(Serial))_"; " Write "" Write "Гарантийный талон №: "_($G(Garant))_";" Write "" Write "
    ",! Write " " Write "" Write "История изменения номеров: "_($G(NumbersHistory))_";" Write "" Write "
    2. ",! Write "
",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write " " Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"
    ",! Write "
  1. " Write "" Write "Наименование продавца," Write "" Write " "_($G(SellerName))_" " Write "" Write "" Write "адрес" Write "" Write ":"_($G(SellerAddress))_"" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "; " Write "" Write "" Write "Телефон:"_($G(SellerPhone))_"" Write "" Write ";",! Write " Дата продажи:" Write "" Write " ",! Write " " Write "" Write ""_($G(SellerDate))_";" Write "" Write "
    2. ",! Write "
",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write " " Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"
    ",! Write "
  1. " Write "" Write "Наименование",! Write " сервисного центра" Write "" Write ": " Write "" Write ($G(SrvName)) Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write ";
    " Write "    " Write "Адрес: "_($G(SrvAddr))_";" Write "    " Write !,"
    2. ",! Write "
",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write " " Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"
    ",! Write "
  1. " Write "" Write " Дата осмотра: " Write "" Write ($G(ExpertDate)) Write "" Write "; Дата поступления в",! Write " ремонт: " Write "" Write ($G(RemontDate)) Write "" Write "; " Write "" Write !,"
    Телефон: "_($G(SrvPhone))_"" Write "    " Write "; Ф.И.О. директора: " Write "" Write ""_($G(SrvFIO))_"" Write "" Write ";" Write "    " Write !,"
    2. ",! Write "
",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write " " Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"
    ",! Write "
  1. " Write "" Write "Количество",! Write " проведенных ремонтов данного изделия "_($G(RepairsQnt))_"" Write "" Write "
    2. ",! Write "
",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write " " Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"
    ",! Write "
  1. " Write "" Write "Подробное описание неисправности: "_($G(DefectDescription))_";" Write "" Write "
    2. ",! Write "
",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write " " Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"
    ",! Write "
  1. " Write "" Write "Предполагаемая",! Write " причина возникновения неисправности" Write "" Write ": "_($G(DefectEstimate))_";" Write "" Write "" Write "
    2. ",! Write "
",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write " " Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"
    ",! Write "
  1. " Write "" Write "" Write "Классификация",! Write " происхождения дефекта: "_($G(DefectClass))_" "_($G(DefectClassDescr))_";" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write "
    2. ",! Write "
",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write " " Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"
    ",! Write "
  1. " Write "" Write "Причина отказа в проведении гарантийного ремонта" Write "" Write " :"_($G(RepairRefuseReason))_"" Write "" Write "" Write "
    2. ;",! Write "
",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write " " Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"
    ",! Write "
  1. " Write "" Write "" Write "Заявка" Write "" Write "" Write "" Write " по которой были заказаны запчасти и не",! Write " поступили (номер, дата, заявленные запчасти): "_($G(RequestRows))_"",! Write " ",! Write " " Write "" Write "
    2. ",! Write "

",! Write !,"

    2. ",! Write "
",! Write !,"

" Write "" Write " " Write "" Write "

",! Write !,"

  1. " Write "" Write "Товар оставлен в сервисном центре на",! Write " ответственное хранение "_($G(GoodsKeeping))_";" Write "" Write "

Method.name: OnPageCSPROOT
Method.Implementation: Write !,! s DocId=%request.Get("id") s:DocId DocObj = ##class(Docs.Act).%OpenId(DocId) d:$ISOBJECT($G(DocObj)) . d:$ISOBJECT(DocObj.Kontr) . . s KontrName=DocObj.Kontr.Name . . s KontrAddress=DocObj.Kontr.Address . . s KontrId=DocObj.Kontr.%Id() . f i="Name","Goods","Serial","Garant","SellerName","SellerAddress","SellerPhone","RepairsQnt","DefectDescription","DefectEstimate","DefectClass","RepairRefuseReason","CustomerName","CustomerAddress","CustomerDoc","CustomerPhone","DefectClassDescr","GoodsKeeping","SrvName","SrvAddr","SrvPhone","SrvFIO","NumbersHistory" d . . s @i=$ZOBJPROPERTY(DocObj,i) . s DefectClass=##class(Docs.Act).DefectClassLogicalToDisplay(DefectClass) . s GoodsKeeping=##class(Docs.Act).GoodsKeepingLogicalToDisplay(GoodsKeeping) . f i="ExpertDate","ExpertDate","RemontDate","ActDate","SellerDate" d . . s @i=$ZOBJPROPERTY(DocObj,i) . . if @i?5N s @i=$ZD(@i,4) . if $ISOBJECT(Goods) d . . s GoodsName=Goods.Name . . s GoodsId = Goods.%Id() . . s GoodsModel=Goods.ModelNumber . . s GoodsAbbr=Goods.abbr . e s (GoodsName,GoodsModel)="не указано" . s RequestRows="" . q:'$ISOBJECT(DocObj.Items) . s i="" f s i=DocObj.Items.Next(i) q:i="" d . . s item=DocObj.Items.GetAt(i) . . //q:'$ISOBJECT(item.Request) . . s RequestRows=RequestRows_item.Request.Name_" "_$ZD(item.Request.Dat,4)_" "_item.RequestItem.Goods.FullName_"; " . s MM=$$$TunesVariableGlobal("MM") //список аббревиатур мастермакс через запятую . s VC=$$$TunesVariableGlobal("VC") . s TL=$$$TunesVariableGlobal("TL") . f brandname="MM","VC","TL" d . . f i=1:1:$L(@brandname,",") d . . . //обрезаем пробелы . . . s abbr=$TR($P(@brandname,",",i)," ","") . . . q:abbr="" . . . s @brandname@(abbr)="" . s BrandName=$S($D(MM(GoodsAbbr)):"Mastermax",$D(VC(GoodsAbbr)):"Viconte",$D(TL(GoodsAbbr)):"Tull",1:"") Write !,! Do ..OnPageHTML()

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<meta http-equiv=Content-Type content=""text/html; charset=windows-1251"">" Write !,"<title>Акт технической экспертизы "_($G(Name))_"</title>",! Write "<style>" Write !,".ClickSpan{cursor:hand;}",! Write ".ClickSpan:hover{",! Write "font-family:Arial;",! Write "font-size:14px;",! Write "color:rgb(90,0,0);",! Write "text-decoration : underline;",! Write "}",! Write "<!--",! Write " /* Font Definitions */",! Write " @font-face",! Write " {font-family:""Arial Unicode MS"";",! Write " panose-1:2 11 6 4 2 2 2 2 2 4;",! Write " mso-font-charset:0;",! Write " mso-generic-font-family:roman;",! Write " mso-font-format:other;",! Write " mso-font-pitch:variable;",! Write " mso-font-signature:3 0 0 0 1 0;}",! Write "@font-face",! Write " {font-family:Tahoma;",! Write " panose-1:2 11 6 4 3 5 4 4 2 4;",! Write " mso-font-charset:204;",! Write " mso-generic-font-family:swiss;",! Write " mso-font-pitch:variable;",! Write " mso-font-signature:1627421319 -2147483648 8 0 66047 0;}",! Write " /* Style Definitions */",! Write " p.MsoNormal, li.MsoNormal, div.MsoNormal",! Write " {mso-style-parent:"""";",! Write " margin:0cm;",! Write " margin-bottom:.0001pt;",! Write " mso-pagination:widow-orphan;",! Write " font-size:12.0pt;",! Write " font-family:""Times New Roman"";",! Write " mso-fareast-font-family:""Times New Roman"";}",! Write "h1",! Write " {mso-style-next:Обычный;",! Write " margin:0cm;",! Write " margin-bottom:.0001pt;",! Write " mso-pagination:widow-orphan;",! Write " page-break-after:avoid;",! Write " mso-outline-level:1;",! Write " font-size:14.0pt;",! Write " mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;",! Write " font-family:Arial;",! Write " mso-fareast-font-family:""Arial Unicode MS"";",! Write " mso-font-kerning:0pt;}",! Write "p.MsoDocumentMap, li.MsoDocumentMap, div.MsoDocumentMap",! Write " {mso-style-noshow:yes;",! Write " margin:0cm;",! Write " margin-bottom:.0001pt;",! Write " mso-pagination:widow-orphan;",! Write " background:navy;",! Write " font-size:12.0pt;",! Write " font-family:Tahoma;",! Write " mso-fareast-font-family:""Times New Roman"";}",! Write "span.SpellE",! Write " {mso-style-name:"""";",! Write " mso-spl-e:yes;}",! Write "span.GramE",! Write " {mso-style-name:"""";",! Write " mso-gram-e:yes;}",! Write "@page Section1",! Write " {size:595.3pt 841.9pt;",! Write " margin:2.0cm 42.5pt 2.0cm 3.0cm;",! Write " mso-header-margin:35.4pt;",! Write " mso-footer-margin:35.4pt;",! Write " mso-paper-source:0;}",! Write "div.Section1",! Write " {page:Section1;}",! Write " /* List Definitions */",! Write " @list l0",! Write " {mso-list-type:hybrid;}",! Write "@list l0:level1",! Write " {mso-level-tab-stop:36.0pt;",! Write " mso-level-number-position:left;",! Write " text-indent:-18.0pt;}",! Write "ol",! Write " {margin-bottom:0cm;}",! Write "ul",! Write " {margin-bottom:0cm;}",! Write "-->" Write !,"</style>" Write !,"<!--[if gte mso 10]>",! Write "<style>",! Write " /* Style Definitions */",! Write " table.MsoNormalTable",! Write " {mso-style-name:""Обычная таблица"";",! Write " mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;",! Write " mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;",! Write " mso-style-noshow:yes;",! Write " mso-style-parent:"""";",! Write " mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;",! Write " mso-para-margin:0cm;",! Write " mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;",! Write " mso-pagination:widow-orphan;",! Write " font-size:10.0pt;",! Write " font-family:""Times New Roman"";",! Write " mso-ansi-language:#0400;",! Write " mso-fareast-language:#0400;",! Write " mso-bidi-language:#0400;}",! Write "</style>",! Write "<![endif]-->" Write !,"<script language=""javascript"" type=""text/javascript"">" Write !,"function wopen(url,params)",! Write "{",! Write " if(typeof(params) == ""undefined""){var params=""""}",! Write " //window.showModalDialog(url,params,""center:yes;status:no;dialogHeight:400px;dialogWidth:800px;resizable:yes"")",! Write " window.open(url);",! Write "}",! Write "</script>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html xmlns:o=""urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office"" xmlns:w=""urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:word"" xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40"">" Write !,! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write !,! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,!,"</html>"

Method.name: OnPreHTTP
Method.Implementation: if %request.Get("word")="on" { set %response.ContentType = "application/msword" do %response.SetHeader("Content-Disposition","attachment;word.doc") set %response.Expires = "Thu, 01 Apr 2003 00:00:00 GMT" } q 1
